public java.util.List<Log> getLogs()

        A list of all logs that were retrieved

      • getLog

        @GetMapping(value="/{logId}")
public java.util.Optional<Log> getLog(@PathVariable
                                                                     int logId)
        The REST Get Mapping to retrieve a single log using its id
        Parameters:
        logId - The id of the log to be retrieved
        Returns:
        The log that was retrieved

      • getSpecificLogs

        @GetMapping(value="/search")
public java.util.List<Log> getSpecificLogs(@RequestBody
                                                                         SearchParameters searchParameters)
        The REST Get Mapping to find all the logs that match certain parameters. Those parameters can be userId, a range of time that the log was saved, and log type
        Parameters:
        searchParameters - The parameters to be used in the search
        Returns:
        The list of all the logs that were retrieved

      • addLog

        @PostMapping
public Log addLog(@RequestBody
                                Log log)
        The REST Post mapping to add a log to the database
        Parameters:
        log - The log to be added to the database
        Returns:
        The log that was added to the database

      • updateLog

        @PutMapping
public Log updateLog(@RequestBody
                                  Log log)
        The REST Put mapping to update a log in the database
        Parameters:
        log - The log to be updated
        Returns:
        The log that was updated

      • deleteLog

        @DeleteMapping(value="/{id}")
public java.lang.String deleteLog(@PathVariable
                                                                 int id)
        The REST Delete Mapping to delete a log in the database
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the log to be deleted
        Returns:
        A String telling the user the id of the log that was deleted
